questions.question: Can you explain the differences between a Spring Boot application using REST APIs and one using WebFlux?
Describe how you would implement authentication in a microservices architecture using Spring Security.
How do you document a REST API using OpenAPI and Swagger in a Spring application?
How would you set up a CI/CD pipeline for a Java application deployed on AWS?
Can you describe a time when you had to resolve a conflict within your team? What was your approach?
Tell me about a leadership experience where you had to guide your team through a challenging project. How did you motivate them?
